name: 扔彩虹模擬器 | Coin Toss Rainbow Simulator
name_original: 扔彩虹模擬器 | Coin Toss Rainbow Simulator
description:
Made in Hong Kong. By Unreal Engine 5.3.1. With TSR (Temporal Super Resolution).

Gameplay:
This is a Coin Toss Rainbow Simulator of course. Toss the coin and win the prize.

Features:
> 1st person POV simulator.
> Toss the coin and test your luck. You know the rules and so do I (do I do I).
> Adjustable tossing power.
> Language free.
> No post-processing filter / No head bobbing in game.
> Right click to zoom in. Double check the result yourself.
> No pressure. Enjoy and have fun.

Settings:
- Supports Full Screen / Windowed Mode
- Supports TSR (50% / 75% / 100%)

By Unreal Engine 5.3.1.
